feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 12, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 15:00 UTC

Jul 17, 22:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 12/08/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R806R21
entry.content:
Jul 18, 19:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/07/2024 14:08 UTC
End Time : 18/07/2024 15:52 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2a/rbx2b/rbx2c
Service impact : Customers instances in rack R806R21 are temporarily unavailable.
Related Incident : Incident link
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 18, 15:57 UTC
Monitoring - Since 15:52 UTC all customer instances are available again.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Jul 18, 14:44 UTC
Identified - Start time : 18/07/2024 14:08 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2a/rbx2b/rbx2c
Service impact : Customers instances in rack R806R21 are temporarily unavailable.
Related Incident : Incident link
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
